title: I never start a game unprepared

replies.body: Oh god, horrible idea. I can only imagine the sweaty, chocolatey mess I would have to clean up after attempting something like this...
I know, I can already feel the sweaty, clammy chocolate against my forearm.... Yughhh *shivers*
My left up vote is stronger then my right up vote, and have that cause the photo has a twix.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Oh finally! (notices Vayne icon)
KILL IT WITH FIRE!!!
